document: TRANSIENT MOISTURE EFFECTS ON THE VISCOELASTICITY OF SYNTHETIC FIBERS AND COMPOSITES by Zhiqiang Wang Dissertation submitted to the Graduate Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Engineering Mechanics APPROVED: D.
